overview: A ghostly flickering illuminates the polar night – a mysterious, coloured display in the night sky that has intrigued people from time immemorial. The aurora is without doubt the most striking natural phenomenon in the polar regions of our planet. The documentary ‘Aurora – Fire in the Sky’ presents the phenomenon of the polar lights from various aspects. The film crew for this international production shot in Norway, Greenland, Canada, Alaska and New Zealand.
title: Aurora - Fire in the Sky
